privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We don't track shit - no IP addresses or analytics tools.
privacy.whatWeStore: The only information we store is:
privacy.li2: Your chosen location (country and postal code)
privacy.li4: Your contact information (if you provide it)
privacy.conclusion: That's it. No tracking, no analytics, no bullshit.

terms.title: Terms of Service

hobbyUse.title: Hobby Use Only
hobbyUse.text: By using XMR Meet, you agree that you are using this platform for hobby purposes only. This is not a commercial trading platform.

tradeLimits.title: Trade Limits for Your Safety
tradeLimits.text: For your own safety and security, you agree to not exceed XMR valued at $300 USD on any single trade. This limit helps protect all users from significant financial risk.

responsibility.title: Personal Responsibility
responsibility.li1: Your personal safety when meeting others
responsibility.li2: Verifying the identity and trustworthiness of trading partners
responsibility.li4: Complying with all local laws and regulations
responsibility.li5: The accuracy of information you provide

liability.title: No Liability
liability.text: XMR Meet is a bulletin board service only. We provide no guarantees, warranties, or liability for any trades, meetings, or interactions that occur through this platform.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.text: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms or engage in fraudulent, illegal, or harmful behavior.

terms.agreement: By creating an account and using this service, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these terms.
